Posts.EditableText: Hello! I'm new to these forums, and trying out Squiffy for the first time (and loving it!). I'm having difficulty, however, with trying to implement a way to produce slower text, as in the "Text FX typewriter" command for Quest (http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... riter.html). Is there a way to do this in Squiffy, please?
Posts.HTML: Hello! I'm new to these forums, and trying out Squiffy for the first time (and loving it!). I'm having difficulty, however, with trying to implement a way to produce slower text, as in the "Text FX typewriter" command for Quest (http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... riter.html). Is there a way to do this in Squiffy, please?

Posts.EditableText: Quest uses jquery.text-effects.js: https://github.com/jaz303/jquery-grab-b ... effects.js Demos and what passes for documentation here: http://onehackoranother.com/projects/jq ... fects.html
Posts.HTML:
Quest uses jquery.text-effects.js: https://github.com/jaz303/jquery-grab-b ... effects.js

Demos and what passes for documentation here: http://onehackoranother.com/projects/jq ... fects.html
